articles.title: Huge gas explosion and fire kills at least 3, injures hundreds in Kenyan capital - CNN
articles.description: A gas explosion in Kenya’s capital on Thursday night killed at least three people and injured 280 others, according to authorities in the East African country.
articles.content: A gas explosion at an unlicensed cooking gas filling plant in Kenyas capital on Thursday night killed at least three people and injured 280 others, according to authorities in the East African countr… [+1933 chars]
